lead_paragraph: Travel industry shares moved lower, as did energy and materials companies. Health care and technology stocks gained ground.

headline.print_headline: Shares Decline After Attacks in Belgium
headline.main: Shares Decline After Terror Attacks in Belgium

snippet: Travel industry shares moved lower, as did energy and materials companies. Health care and technology stocks gained ground.
abstract: United States stocks drop, ending four-day market winning streak, largely as result of decline in shares of travel-related companies in wake of terrorist attacks in Belgium.
